io.reinert.requestor

Class RequestDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.reinert.requestor.RequestDispatcher
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RequestDispatcherImpl

    public abstract class RequestDispatcher
extends Object
    This class dispatches the requests and return promises.
    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

    • Method Detail

      • send

        protected abstract <R> void send(PreparedRequest request,
                                 Deferred<R> deferred,
                                 Class<R> resolveType,
                                 Class<?> parametrizedType)
        Sends the request through the wire and resolves (or rejects) the deferred when completed. The success result must be a instance of #resultType.

        Implementations must execute an HTTP Request with given values and resolve/reject the deferred when the request is finished. It is recommended that progress events be sent to Deferred.notifyDownload(RequestProgress) and Deferred.notifyUpload(RequestProgress).

        All possible exceptions should be caught and sent to Deferred.reject(RequestException) wrapped in a RequestException or any of its children. This will avoid breaking code flow when some exception occurs.
        Type Parameters:
        R - The expected type of the promise
        Parameters:
        request - The request to be sent
        deferred - The deferred to resolve or reject when completed
        resolveType - The class of the expected result in the promise
        parametrizedType - The class of the parametrized type if a collection is expected as result

      • dispatch

        public <T,S extends MutableSerializedRequest & SerializableRequest> Promise<T> dispatch(S request,
                                                                                        Class<T> resultType)
        Sends the request and return an instance of Promise expecting a sole result.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The expected type in response payload
        Parameters:
        request - The built request
        resultType - The class instance of the expected type in response payload
        Returns:
        The promise for the dispatched request

      • dispatch

        public <T,C extends Collection<T>,S extends MutableSerializedRequest & SerializableRequest> Promise<Collection<T>> dispatch(S request,
                                                                                                                            Class<T> resultType,
                                                                                                                            Class<C> containerType)
        Sends the request and return an instance of Promise expecting a collection result.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The expected type in response payload
        C - The collection type to hold the values
        Parameters:
        request - The built request
        resultType - The class instance of the expected type in response payload
        containerType - The class instance of the container type which will hold the values
        Returns:
        The promise for the dispatched request

      • dispatch

        public <T> void dispatch(MutableSerializedRequest request,
                         Class<T> resultType,
                         com.google.gwt.core.client.Callback<T,Throwable> callback)
        Sends the request with the respective callback bypassing request processing.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The expected type in response payload
        Parameters:
        request - The built request
        resultType - The class instance of the expected type in response payload
        callback - The callback to be executed when done

      • dispatch

        public <T,C extends Collection<T>> void dispatch(MutableSerializedRequest request,
                                                 Class<T> resultType,
                                                 Class<C> containerType,
                                                 com.google.gwt.core.client.Callback<Collection<T>,Throwable> callback)
        Sends the request with the respective callback expecting a collection result bypassing request processing.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The expected type in response payload
        C - The collection type to hold the values
        Parameters:
        request - The built request
        resultType - The class instance of the expected type in response payload
        containerType - The class instance of the container type which will hold the values
        callback - The callback to be executed when done

      • evalResponse

        protected <R> void evalResponse(Request request,
                                Deferred<R> deferred,
                                Class<R> resolveType,
                                Class<?> parametrizedType,
                                RawResponse response)
        Evaluates the response and resolves the deferred. This method must be called by implementations after the response is received.
        Type Parameters:
        R - Type of the deferred
        Parameters:
        request - Dispatched request
        deferred - Promise to be resolved
        resolveType - Class of the expected type in the promise
        parametrizedType - Class of the parametrized type if the promise expects a collection
        response - The response received from the request

        protected io.reinert.requestor.SerializationEngine getSerializationEngine()
